about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger Ausf.H1 Ostfront (Rank 3, Germany)

  • Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger Ausf.H1 Westfront (Rank 3, Germany)

  • Flakpanzer IV Ostwind II Ostfront (Rank 3, Germany)

  • Premium account for 15 days

  • 1000 Golden Eagles

The “Two Fronts” collectible premium pack is a perfect choice for players who haven’t started the German tree yet, or for anyone who loves Tigers! This pack contains a lineup of premium vehicles offering you more spawns in battle, which in turn will net you more Research Points!

The pair of premium Tiger H1 heavy tanks are inspired by Tiger tanks on the Eastern and Western fronts, with aesthetic elements inspired by each theatre. These Tigers both feature some additional track armor, and greater gun depression over the corners of the hull due to the removal of the anti-infantry mortars. Aside from this, they both feature the same legendary 88 mm cannon with destructive APHE rounds!

Protecting the skies is the premium Ostwind II, complete with camouflage netting and Ostketten tracks, increasing its mobility over rough terrain. Its pair of 37 mm Flak44 cannons can equip both APHE and HE rounds, allowing you to shred lightly armored vehicles and disable heavier ones, and take aircraft out of the sky with only a few hits!

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger Ausf.H1 Ostfront (Rank 3, Germany)

  • Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger Ausf.H1 Westfront (Rank 3, Germany)

  • Flakpanzer IV Ostwind II Ostfront (Rank 3, Germany)

  • 1000 Golden Eagles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
